page.title: 06BUILDINGS OF INTEREST cont.
page.content: {THE VILLAGE INN} The Redwoods Inn was formerly called the Crossways Inn until 1893 when the name was changed to honour the Redwood family,former landlords and good customers.The inn has a skittle alley. {KENT COTTAGE} This is a small cottage in the village built about 130 years ago and is built of stone.This was originally the home of a basket maker. {UPLOWMAN PRIMARY SCHOOL} This is a small village school with children from 5 to 11.The school was built in 1874.There are 30 children on roll and 2 teachers.When the children are 11 they attend Uffculme school.
